item.title: eŠkola
item.description: Improve the education experience. eŠkola platform improves efficiency in school administration, analytic and reporting as well a better and faster communication between school, parents and pupils.

item.title: Chrome2Pdf (Composer package)
item.description: Open on packagist. Convert HTML to Pdf using headless chrome.

item.title: JMBG (Composer package)
item.description: Open on packagist. Validate, generate and extract data from JMBG (Unique Master Citizen Number).

item.title: ес Дневник - Elektronski Sistem Dnevnik
item.description: ес Дневник is a online service for management of digital records and data of Serbian primary and secondary schools.

item.title: Laravel Multilog (Composer package - Archived)
item.description: Open on packagist. Easily add multiple monolog channels to your Laravel 5.2.* application.

item.title: Laravel Theme (Composer package - Archived)
item.description: Open on packagist. Add theming support to your Laravel 5.* projects.

item.title: E-Dnevnik
item.description: E-Dnevnik is a web application for the management of the class register in electronic form, which began as a pilot project at the beginning of the 2011/2012 school year. In school year 2014/2015 30% of schools is using e-Class Registry. I’ve worked on feature implementations, rewriting, architecture design and maintenance in all areas of application.

item.title: Mogy
item.description: Mogy is a unique tool for the modern coach. I was involved in development in 2nd phase of the project. I worked on frontend and backend development.

item.title: Saltkin
item.description: Saltkin is a responsive admin dashboard template based on Bootstrap 3 framework. It offers a variety of layout options and it’s fully responsive and HTML5/CSS3 compliant. You can buy this template on ThemeForest.

item.title: Alatnica Mikuš
item.description: Complete website development for Alatnica Mikuš, company that is engaged in metalworking, manufactoring tools and machine proccessing. I did the web design, frontend development and integration with ProcessWire CMS.

item.title: Kato
item.description: Personal project, Kato is bootstrap 3 based HTML5 admin responsive template. It features simple clean design with easily changeable colors. You can buy this template on ThemeForest.

item.title: MobilityDay 2014
item.description: MobilityDay is a conference targeting IT professionals who are involved in mobile solutions. It was my first project on a new job. I worked on responsive development and Wordpress integration.
